channel.title: Mines on Keenan Schott
channel.description: Recent content in Mines on Keenan Schott

item.title: Colorado School of Mines
item.description: After just over two months since graduating from the Colorado School of Mines, I find myself reflecting on my time in Golden. This post focuses exclusively on my academic endeavors, aiming to capture the ways in which I attempted to better myself given concisely summarizing the entirety of my experiences is an impossible task. I considered discussing the interesting technical knowledge I now have under my belt; not only does that conversation fail to provide a sensible close to this era of my life, but it can’t provide you, the reader, with anything worthwhile. Rather, I wish to speak about one class I took at Mines in particular and why I consider it my favorite.
